Public MustInherit Class TrackingService Inherits WorkflowRuntimeService

summary.span: 提供在跟踪服务与运行时跟踪基础结构之间的基本接口。

span.span: Provides the basic interface between a tracking service and the run-time tracking infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 跟踪服务负责向工作流运行时引擎提供跟踪通道和跟踪配置文件。A tracking service is responsible for supplying tracking channels and tracking profiles to the workflow run-time engine. 工作流运行时引擎为它具有 的每个工作流实例从跟踪服务请求一个 。The workflow run-time engine requests one from a tracking service for each workflow instance for which it has a . 工作流运时引擎使用此 发送与该工作流实例关联的跟踪记录。The workflow run-time engine uses this to send tracking records associated with that workflow instance. 包含指定一组跟踪事件的跟踪点，运行时跟踪基础结构应为这些事件发送跟踪记录。A contains track points that specify a set of tracking events for which the run-time tracking infrastructure should send tracking records. 还可以指定在其中一个跟踪事件发生时要从工作流实例中提取的数据。A may also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance when one of these tracking events occurs. 运行时跟踪基础结构使用 以筛选由工作流实例发出的跟踪事件。The run-time tracking infrastructure uses a to filter tracking events emitted by a workflow instance. 在发出了与 中的跟踪点匹配的跟踪事件时，运行时跟踪基础结构将从工作流实例中提取在 中指定的任何数据，并将此数据和有关跟踪事件的信息包装在跟踪记录中。When a tracking event is emitted that matches a track point in the , the run-time tracking infrastructure extracts any data specified in the from the workflow instance and encapsulates this data and information about the tracking event in a tracking record. 然后，将通过与工作流实例关联的 发送此跟踪记录。This tracking record is then sent over the associated with the workflow instance. 跟踪记录可能为以下某一类型：A tracking record may be one of the following kinds: 主机应用程序可以通过它选择的任何方式使用跟踪记录。The host application can use the tracking record in any way that it chooses. 例如，宿主应用程序可以将跟踪信息存储在数据库中并使用它来实现复杂的用户界面，或者，它可以使用该信息将需要某种操作的情况通知管理员。For example, the host application may store the tracking information in a database and use it to implement a sophisticated user interface, or it may use the information to inform an administrator of a condition that requires some action. 通过调用 或在应用程序配置文件中包括适当的条目，您可以向工作流运行时引擎注册跟踪服务。You can register a tracking service with the workflow run-time engine by calling or by including the appropriate entry in the application configuration file. 所有跟踪服务都必须从 抽象类继承。All tracking services must inherit from the abstract class. 此类在跟踪服务与运行时跟踪基础结构之间定义基本接口。This class defines the basic interface between a tracking service and the run-time tracking infrastructure. 工作流运行时引擎通过调用某个重载 方法或 方法，为特定工作流实例或工作流 请求 。The workflow run-time engine requests a for a specific workflow instance or workflow by calling one of the overloaded methods or the method. 工作流运行时引擎调用 以请求 。The workflow run-time engine calls to request a . 在创建工作流实例或从持久性存储区中加载工作流实例时，工作流跟踪运行时将调用 和 方法。The workflow tracking runtime calls the and methods whenever a workflow instance is created or loaded from the persistence store. 与这些调用关联的系统开销对于跟踪服务而言可能很大（举例来说，多个数据库调用）。The overhead associated with these calls can be costly to the tracking service (many database calls, for example). 你可以在跟踪服务中实现 接口以避开这种基于调用的机制，并使用事件将 的更改通知工作流运行时引擎。You can implement the interface in your tracking service to circumvent this call-based mechanism and use events to notify the workflow runtime engine of changes to a . 对于实现 接口的跟踪服务，工作流运行时引擎将订阅 和 事件。For tracking services that implement the interface, the workflow run-time engine subscribes to the and events. 当它的某个跟踪配置文件发生更改时，跟踪服务可以引发适当的事件。Your tracking service can raise the appropriate event when a change to one of its tracking profiles occurs. 类实现了此接口。The class implements this interface. 工作流运行时引擎调用 方法，以测试 是否已因为主机或服务在工作流实例上显式调用了 而更新或被移除。The workflow run-time engine calls the method to test whether a has been updated or removed as a result of an explicit call by a host or a service to on a workflow instance. 此过程使宿主或服务能够动态地更改正用于特定工作流实例的跟踪配置文件。This process enables a host or service to dynamically change the tracking profile that is being used for a specific workflow instance.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为具有从 `TerminationTrackingService` 派生的类型的 `TrackingService` 对象创建新实例。The following example shows how to create a new instance of a `TerminationTrackingService` object, of a type that derives from `TrackingService`. 此示例摘自“终止跟踪服务”SDK 示例。This sample is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [终止跟踪服务示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#111)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#111)]

summary.span: 必须在派生类中重写，并且在实现后为指定的工作流实例或工作流类型获取跟踪配置文件。

span.span: Must be overridden in the derived class, and when implemented, gets the tracking profile for a specified workflow instance or workflow type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪服务负责管理可用于特定工作流类型和特定工作流实例的跟踪配置文件。A tracking service is responsible for managing the tracking profiles available for specific workflow types and specific workflow instances. 可以采用您选择的任何方式实现此管理。You can implement this management in whatever manner you choose. 例如，您可以为每个工作流 和工作流实例返回相同的 ；或者，您可以管理工作流实例、工作流 和 引用的跟踪配置文件的复杂存储。For example, you can return the same for every workflow and workflow instance; or you can manage a sophisticated store of tracking profiles referenced by workflow instance, workflow , and .

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile GetProfile (Guid workflowInstanceId);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile GetProfile(valuetype System.Guid workflowInstanceId) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Function GetProfile (workflowInstanceId As Guid) As TrackingProfile
protected public: abstract System::Workflow::Runtime::Tracking::TrackingProfile ^ GetProfile(Guid workflowInstanceId);
abstract member GetProfile : Guid -> System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile

span.span: The of the workflow instance.

summary.span: 必须在派生类中重写，并且在实现后为指定的工作流实例返回跟踪配置文件。

span.span: Must be overridden in the derived class, and when implemented, returns the tracking profile for the specified workflow instance.

returns.span: 指定工作流实例的跟踪配置文件。

span.span: The tracking profile for the specified workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪服务负责管理可用于特定工作流类型和特定工作流实例的跟踪配置文件。A tracking service is responsible for managing the tracking profiles available for specific workflow types and specific workflow instances. 可以采用您选择的任何方式实现此管理。You can implement this management in whatever manner you choose. 例如，您可以为每个工作流 和工作流实例返回相同的 ；或者，您可以管理工作流实例、工作流 和 引用的跟踪配置文件的复杂存储。For example, you can return the same for every workflow and workflow instance; or you can manage a sophisticated store of tracking profiles referenced by workflow instance, workflow , and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `GetProfile` 方法的实现。The following example shows an implementation of the `GetProfile` method. 在本例中，`GetProfile` 方法的若干重载将调用单一的私有 `GetProfile` 方法，后者将返回硬编码的默认跟踪配置文件。In this example, several overloads of the `GetProfile` method call a single private `GetProfile` method, which returns a hard-coded, default tracking profile. 此示例摘自“终止跟踪服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [终止跟踪服务示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#115](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#115)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#115](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#115)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪服务负责管理可用于特定工作流类型和特定工作流实例的跟踪配置文件。A tracking service is responsible for managing the tracking profiles available for specific workflow types and specific workflow instances. 可以采用您选择的任何方式实现此管理。You can implement this management in whatever manner you choose. 例如，您可以为每个工作流 和工作流实例返回相同的 ；或者，您可以管理工作流实例、工作流 和 引用的跟踪配置文件的复杂存储。For example, you can return the same for every workflow and workflow instance; or you can manage a sophisticated store of tracking profiles referenced by workflow instance, workflow , and .

span.span: The associated with the workflow instance.

summary.span: 必须在派生类中重写，并且在实现后返回运行时跟踪基础结构用于向跟踪服务发送跟踪记录的通道。

span.span: Must be overridden in the derived class, and when implemented, returns the channel that the run-time tracking infrastructure uses to send tracking records to the tracking service.

returns.span: 用于向跟踪服务发送跟踪记录的 。

span.span: The that is used to send tracking records to the tracking service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行时跟踪基础结构按照每个跟踪服务为每个工作流实例使用一个 。The run-time tracking infrastructure uses one for each tracking service for each workflow instance. 工作流运行时引擎对每个跟踪服务调用 ，以便为该服务获取 。The workflow run-time engine calls on each tracking service to get the for that service. 您可以使用传入 的信息将为跟踪服务在 上发送的跟踪数据与特定的根工作流实例关联。You can use the information passed in to associate tracking data sent on the for your tracking service with a particular root workflow instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `GetTrackingChannel` 方法的实现。The following example shows an implementation of the `GetTrackingChannel` method. 此示例摘自“终止跟踪服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [终止跟踪服务示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#113](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#113)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#113](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#113)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪服务负责管理可用于特定工作流类型和特定工作流实例的跟踪配置文件。A tracking service is responsible for managing the tracking profiles available for specific workflow types and specific workflow instances. 可以采用您选择的任何方式实现此管理。You can implement this management in whatever manner you choose. 例如，您可以为每个工作流 和工作流实例返回相同的 ；或者，您可以管理工作流实例、工作流 和 引用的跟踪配置文件的复杂存储。For example, you can return the same for every workflow and workflow instance; or you can manage a sophisticated store of tracking profiles referenced by workflow instance, workflow , and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `TryGetProfile` 方法的实现，该方法调用私有 `GetProfile` 方法。The following example demonstrates an implementation of the `TryGetProfile` method, which calls a private `GetProfile` method. 此示例摘自“终止跟踪服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [终止跟踪服务示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). abstract member TryReloadProfile : Type * Guid * TrackingProfile -> bool

The of the workflow instance.

summary.span: 必须在派生类中重写，并且在实现后为指定的工作流实例检索新的跟踪配置文件（如果跟踪配置文件自上次加载后已更改）。

span.span: Must be overridden in the derived class, and when implemented, retrieves a new tracking profile for the specified workflow instance if the tracking profile has changed since it was last loaded.

returns.span: 如果应加载新的 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a new should be loaded; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果为 ，则会在 中返回 。

span.span: If , the is returned in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行时跟踪基础结构调用 以确定是否应为指定的工作流实例加载新的 。 is called by the run-time tracking infrastructure to determine whether a new should be loaded for the specified workflow instance. 如果需要新的 ，它将在 `profile` 中返回。If a new is required, it is returned in `profile`. 如果希望运行时跟踪基础结构停止跟踪某个工作流实例，则跟踪服务应返回 `true`，并将 `profile` 设置为等于空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。If you want the run-time tracking infrastructure to stop tracking a workflow instance, your tracking service should return `true` and set `profile` equal to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 跟踪服务可以采用您选择的任何方式使用 `workflowType` 或 `workflowInstanceId`，以确定是否应重新加载跟踪配置文件。Your tracking service can use `workflowType` or `workflowInstanceId` in whatever manner you choose to determine whether a tracking profile should be reloaded. 例如， 只使用 `workflowInstanceId` 来决定是否应重新加载跟踪配置文件。For example, the only uses `workflowInstanceId` to decide whether the tracking profile should be reloaded. 运行时跟踪基础结构根据其自己的跟踪语义或响应对工作流实例调用 的宿主或服务，以调用 。 is called by the run-time tracking infrastructure according to its own tracking semantics, or in response to the host or a service calling on a workflow instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `TryReloadProfile` 方法的基本实现。The following example shows a basic implementation of the `TryReloadProfile` method. 此示例摘自“终止跟踪服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [终止跟踪服务示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#116](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#116)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#116](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#116)]
